phrs.translation: 低声唱歌者, 低声吟歌的歌手, 低声唱歌的人

sentences.sentence: Boz woke up slowly, convinced he was hearing an ancient crooner sing "White Christmas."
sentences.translation: 博兹缓缓地从睡梦中醒来，确信自己听到有个老歌手在哼唱《白色圣诞节》这首歌。

sentences.sentence: Scandal ensued when Todd's best friend, American crooner Eddie Fisher, then married his widow.
sentences.translation: 之后，泰勒和托德最好的朋友，美国歌手艾迪·费舍尔相恋的绯闻传出。 而艾迪·费舍尔成为了她第四任丈夫。

sentences.sentence: For a young jazz pianist and budding crooner, these moments tend to occur on vampire time. That would be musician time.
sentences.translation: 对于一个年轻的爵士钢琴家和初露头角的民谣歌手来说，“吸血鬼时间”通常是他创作音乐的时间。
